GP12sivap7_u:1416: prajāsarge niyuktaśca sṛjāmi sakalaṃ jagat // ŚivP_7.1,16.15cd/
GP12sivap7_u:1417: manasā nirmitāḥ sarve devi devādayo mayā // ŚivP_7.1,16.16ab/
GP12sivap7_u:1418: na vṛddhimupagacchanti sṛjyamānāḥ punaḥ punaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,16.16cd/
GP12sivap7_u:1420: saṃvardhayitumicchāmi sarvā eva mama prajāḥ // ŚivP_7.1,16.17cd/
GP12sivap7_u:1421: na nirgataṃ purā tvatto nārīṇāṃ kulamavyayam // ŚivP_7.1,16.18ab/
GP12sivap7_u:1422: tena nārīkulaṃ sraṣṭuṃ śaktirmama na vidyate // ŚivP_7.1,16.18cd/
GP12sivap7_u:1423: sarvāsāmeva śaktīnāṃ tvattaḥ khalu samudbhavaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,16.19ab/
GP12sivap7_u:1425: tvāmeva varadāṃ māyāṃ prārthayāmi sureśvarīm // ŚivP_7.1,16.20ab/
GP12sivap7_u:1427: dakṣasya mama putrasya putrī bhava bhavārdini // ŚivP_7.1,16.21ab/
GP12sivap7_u:1428: evaṃ sā yācitā devī brahmaṇā brahmayoninā // ŚivP_7.1,16.21cd/
GP12sivap7_u:1431: brahmāṇaṃ tapasārādhya kuru tasya yathepsitam // ŚivP_7.1,16.23ab/
GP12sivap7_u:1432: tāmājñāṃ parameśasya śirasā pratigṛhya sā // ŚivP_7.1,16.23cd/
GP12sivap7_u:1436: tadā prabhṛti loke 'smin striyāṃ bhogaḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,16.25cd/
GP12sivap7_u:1438: brahmāpi prāpa sānandaṃ santoṣaṃ munipuṃgavāḥ // ŚivP_7.1,16.26cd/
GP12sivap7_u:1441: ya idaṃ kīrtayennityaṃ devyāḥ śaktisamudbhavam // ŚivP_7.1,16.28ab/
GP12sivap7_u:1442: puṇyaṃ sarvamavāpnoti putrāṃśca labhate śubhān // ŚivP_7.1,16.28cd/
GP12sivap7_u:1443: iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe saptamyāṃ vāyavīyasaṃhitāyāṃ pūrvakhaṇḍe devīśaktyudbhavo nāma ṣoḍaśo
GP12sivap7_u:1445: vāyuruvāca evaṃ labdhvā parāṃ śaktimīśvarādeva śāśvatīm // ŚivP_7.1,17.1ab/
GP12sivap7_u:1448: yārdhena nārī sā tasmācchatarūpā vyajāyata // ŚivP_7.1,17.2cd/
GP12sivap7_u:1450: sa vai svāyaṃbhuvaḥ pūrvaṃ puruṣo manurucyate // ŚivP_7.1,17.3cd/
GP12sivap7_u:1451: sā devī śatarūpā tu tapaḥ kṛtvā suduścaram // ŚivP_7.1,17.4ab/
GP12sivap7_u:1455: kanye dve ca mahābhāge yābhyāṃ jātāstvimāḥ prajāḥ // ŚivP_7.1,17.6ab/
GP12sivap7_u:1457: svāyaṃbhuvaḥ prasūtiṃ ca dadau dakṣāya tāṃ prabhuḥ // ŚivP_7.1,17.7ab/
GP12sivap7_u:1459: ākūtyāṃ mithunaṃ jajñe mānasasya ruceḥ śubham // ŚivP_7.1,17.8ab/
GP12sivap7_u:1460: yajñaśca dakṣiṇā caiva yābhyāṃ saṃvartitaṃ jagat // ŚivP_7.1,17.8cd/
GP12sivap7_u:1463: śraddhā lakṣmīrdhṛtiḥ puṣṭistuṣṭirmedhā kriyā tathā // ŚivP_7.1,17.10ab/
GP12sivap7_u:1465: patnyarthaṃ pratijagrāha dharmo dākṣāyaṇīḥ prabhuḥ // ŚivP_7.1,17.11ab/
GP12sivap7_u:1466: tābhyaḥ śiṣṭā yavīyasya ekādaśa sulocanāḥ // ŚivP_7.1,17.11cd/
GP12sivap7_u:1467: khyātiḥ satyarthasaṃbhūtiḥ smṛtiḥ prītiḥ kṣamā tathā // ŚivP_7.1,17.12ab/
GP12sivap7_u:1468: sannatiścānasūyā ca ūrjā svāhā svadhā tathā // ŚivP_7.1,17.12cd/
GP12sivap7_u:1469: bhṛguśśarvo marīciśca aṃgirāḥ pulahaḥ kratuḥ // ŚivP_7.1,17.13ab/
GP12sivap7_u:1472: kāmādyāstu yaśoṃtā ye te trayodaśa sūnavaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,17.14cd/
GP12sivap7_u:1476: naiṣāṃ bhāryāśca putrā vā sarve tvaniyamāḥ smṛtāḥ // ŚivP_7.1,17.16cd/
GP12sivap7_u:1477: sa eṣa tāmasassargo jajñe dharmaniyāmakaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,17.17ab/
GP12sivap7_u:1478: yā sā dakṣasya duhitā rudrasya dayitā satī // ŚivP_7.1,17.17cd/
GP12sivap7_u:1480: dakṣaṃ ca dakṣabhāryāṃ ca viniṃdya saha bandhubhiḥ // ŚivP_7.1,17.18cd/
GP12sivap7_u:1483: rudrastu tāṃ satīṃ dṛṣṭvā rudrāṃstvātmasamaprabhān // ŚivP_7.1,17.19cd/
GP12sivap7_u:1488: svāyaṃbhuve 'ṃtare nītāḥ sarve te bhārgavā matāḥ // ŚivP_7.1,17.22ab/
GP12sivap7_u:1491: yeṣāṃ vaṃśe samutpanno bahuputrasya kaśyapaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,17.23cd/
GP12sivap7_u:1492: smṛtiścāṃgirasaḥ patnī janayāmāsa vai sutau // ŚivP_7.1,17.24ab/
GP12sivap7_u:1497: tatsaṃtatīyā bahavaḥ paulastyā iti viśrutāḥ // ŚivP_7.1,17.26ab/
GP12sivap7_u:1498: kṣamā tu suṣuve putrānpulahasya prajāpateḥ // ŚivP_7.1,17.26cd/
GP12sivap7_u:1499: kardamaśca suriścaiva sahiṣṇuśceti te trayaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,17.27ab/
GP12sivap7_u:1502: naiṣāṃ bhāryāśca putrāśca sarve te hyūrdhvaretasaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,17.28cd/
GP12sivap7_u:1503: ṣaṣṭistāni sahasrāṇi vālakhilyā iti smṛtāḥ // ŚivP_7.1,17.29ab/
GP12sivap7_u:1506: kanyakāṃ ca śrutiṃ nāma mātā śaṃkhapadasya ca // ŚivP_7.1,17.30cd/
GP12sivap7_u:1509: teṣāṃ putrāśca pautrāśca hyātreyāṇāṃ mahātmanām // ŚivP_7.1,17.32ab/
GP12sivap7_u:1511: ūrjāyāṃ tu vasiṣṭhasya putrā vai sapta jajñire // ŚivP_7.1,17.33ab/
GP12sivap7_u:1512: jyāyasī ca svasā teṣāṃ puṃḍarīkā sumadhyamā // ŚivP_7.1,17.33cd/
GP12sivap7_u:1513: rajo gātrordhvabāhū ca savanaścānayaśca yaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,17.34ab/
GP12sivap7_u:1514: sutapāśśukra ityete sapta saptarṣayaḥ smṛtāḥ // ŚivP_7.1,17.34cd/
GP12sivap7_u:1520: svāhā tasya priyā lebhe putrāṃstrīnamitaujasaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,17.37cd/
GP12sivap7_u:1521: pāvakaḥ pavamānaśca śucirityeṣa te trayaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,17.38ab/
GP12sivap7_u:1523: sūrye tapati yaścāsau śuciḥ saura udāhṛtaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,17.39ab/
GP12sivap7_u:1524: havyavāhaḥ kavyavāhaḥ saharakṣā iti trayaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,17.39cd/
GP12sivap7_u:1525: trayāṇāṃ kramaśaḥ putrā devapitṛsurāśca te // ŚivP_7.1,17.40ab/
GP12sivap7_u:1528: sarve tapasvino jñeyāḥ sarve vratabhṛtastathā // ŚivP_7.1,17.41cd/
GP12sivap7_u:1531: tatsarvaṃ rudramuddiśya dattaṃ syānnātra saṃśayaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,17.43ab/
GP12sivap7_u:1536: yuṣmādṛtuṣu sarve hi jāyaṃte sthāsnujaṃgamā // ŚivP_7.1,17.45cd/
GP12sivap7_u:1537: tasmādete pitara ārtavā iti ca śrutam // ŚivP_7.1,17.46ab/
GP12sivap7_u:1540: āgniṣvāttā barhiṣadaḥ pitaro dvividhāḥ smṛtāḥ // ŚivP_7.1,17.47cd/
GP12sivap7_u:1542: svadhāsūta pitṛbhyaśca dve kanye lokaviśrute // ŚivP_7.1,17.48cd/
GP12sivap7_u:1543: menāṃ ca dharaṇīṃ caiva yābhyāṃ viśvamidaṃ dhṛtam // ŚivP_7.1,17.49ab/
GP12sivap7_u:1545: menā himavataḥ patnī mainākaṃ krauṃcameva ca // ŚivP_7.1,17.50ab/
GP12sivap7_u:1546: gaurīṃ gaṃgāṃ ca suṣuve bhavāṃgāśleṣapāvanīm // ŚivP_7.1,17.50cd/
GP12sivap7_u:1552: velāṃ ca niyatiṃ caiva tṛtīyāmapi cāyatim // ŚivP_7.1,17.53cd/
GP12sivap7_u:1556: savarṇāṃ nāma sāmudrīṃ patnīṃ prācīnabarhiṣaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,17.55cd/
GP12sivap7_u:1558: sarve prācetasā nāma dhanurvedasya pāragāḥ // ŚivP_7.1,17.56cd/
GP12sivap7_u:1562: nātisaṃkṣepato viprā nāti vistarataḥ kramāt // ŚivP_7.1,17.58cd/
GP12sivap7_u:1563: varṇitā vai mayā vaṃśā divyā devagaṇānvitāḥ // ŚivP_7.1,17.59ab/
GP12sivap7_u:1566: na hi śakyaḥ prasaṃkhyātuṃ varṣakoṭiśatairapi // ŚivP_7.1,17.60cd/
GP12sivap7_u:1567: rājñāmapi ca yo vaṃśo dvidhā so 'pi pravartate // ŚivP_7.1,17.61ab/
GP12sivap7_u:1570: puṇyaślokāḥ śrutā ye 'tra te pi tadvaṃśasaṃbhavāḥ // ŚivP_7.1,17.62cd/
GP12sivap7_u:1573: kiṃ ceśvarakathā vṛttā yatra tatrānyakīrtanam // ŚivP_7.1,17.64ab/
GP12sivap7_u:1574: na sadbhiḥ saṃmataṃ matvā notsahe bahubhāṣitum // ŚivP_7.1,17.64cd/
GP12sivap7_u:1577: iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe saptamyāṃ vāyavīyasaṃhitāyāṃ pūrvakhaṇḍe sṛṣṭikathanaṃ nāma saptadaśo
GP12sivap7_u:1579: ṛṣaya ūcuḥ devī dakṣasya tanayā tyaktvā dākṣāyaṇī tanum // ŚivP_7.1,18.1ab/
GP12sivap7_u:1581: kathaṃ ca nindito rudro dakṣeṇa ca mahātmanā // ŚivP_7.1,18.2ab/
GP12sivap7_u:1582: nimittamapi kiṃ tatra yena syānniṃdito bhavaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,18.2cd/
GP12sivap7_u:1583: utpannaśca kathaṃ dakṣo abhiśāpādbhavasya tu // ŚivP_7.1,18.3ab/
GP12sivap7_u:1584: cākṣuṣasyāṃtare pūrvaṃ manoḥ prabrūhi māruta // ŚivP_7.1,18.3cd/
GP12sivap7_u:1585: vāyuruvāva śṛṇvaṃtu kathayiṣyāmi dakṣasya laghucetasaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,18.4ab/
GP12sivap7_u:1587: purā surāsurāḥ sarve siddhāśca paramarṣayaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,18.5ab/
GP12sivap7_u:1589: tadā devaśca devī ca divyāsanagatāvubhau // ŚivP_7.1,18.6ab/
GP12sivap7_u:1592: jāmātaraṃ haraṃ draṣṭuṃ draṣṭuṃ cātmasutāṃ satīm // ŚivP_7.1,18.7cd/
GP12sivap7_u:1595: tasya tasyāḥ paraṃ bhāvamajñātuścāpi kevalam // ŚivP_7.1,18.9ab/
GP12sivap7_u:1597: tatastenaiva vaireṇa vidhinā ca pracoditaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,18.10ab/
GP12sivap7_u:1598: nājuvāha bhavaṃ dakṣo dīkṣitastāmapi dviṣan // ŚivP_7.1,18.10cd/
GP12sivap7_u:1602: yayau rudrāya rudrāṇī vijñāpya bhavanaṃ pituḥ // ŚivP_7.1,18.12cd/
GP12sivap7_u:1603: atha saṃnihitaṃ divyaṃ vimānaṃ viśvatomukham // ŚivP_7.1,18.13ab/
GP12sivap7_u:1620: gṛhītvā rudrakanye dve vivījaturubhe śubhe // ŚivP_7.1,18.21ab/
GP12sivap7_u:1627: atha cāgre samāsīnā susmitāsyā śubhāvatī // ŚivP_7.1,18.24cd/
GP12sivap7_u:1631: anyā kāṃcanacārvaṃgī dīptaṃ jagrāha darpaṇam // ŚivP_7.1,18.26cd/
GP12sivap7_u:1632: aparā tālavṛntaṃ ca parā tāṃbūlapeṭikām // ŚivP_7.1,18.27ab/
GP12sivap7_u:1634: kācittu sumanojñāni puṣpāṇi surabhīṇi ca // ŚivP_7.1,18.28ab/
GP12sivap7_u:1644: anāhatāni sanneduḥ kāhalānāṃ śatāni ca // ŚivP_7.1,18.33ab/
GP12sivap7_u:1646: sahasrāṇi śatānyaṣṭau tadānīṃ purato yayuḥ // ŚivP_7.1,18.34ab/
GP12sivap7_u:1647: teṣāṃ madhye vṛṣārūḍho gajārūḍho yathā guruḥ // ŚivP_7.1,18.34cd/
GP12sivap7_u:1651: sasṛjuḥ puṣpavṛṣṭiṃ ca vitānopari vāridāḥ // ŚivP_7.1,18.36cd/
GP12sivap7_u:1652: tadā devagaṇaiścānyaiḥ pathi sarvatra saṃgatā // ŚivP_7.1,18.37ab/
GP12sivap7_u:1654: tāṃ dṛṣṭvā kupito dakṣaścātmanaḥ kṣayakāraṇāt // ŚivP_7.1,18.38ab/
GP12sivap7_u:1655: tasyā yavīyasībhyo 'pi cakre pūjāma satkṛtām // ŚivP_7.1,18.38cd/
GP12sivap7_u:1656: tadā śaśimukhī devī pitaraṃ sadasi sthitam // ŚivP_7.1,18.39ab/
GP12sivap7_u:1659: sa devassāṃprataṃ tāta vidhinā nārcitaḥ kila // ŚivP_7.1,18.40cd/
GP12sivap7_u:1660: tadāstāṃ mama jyāyasyāḥ putryāḥ pūjāṃ kimīdṛśīm // ŚivP_7.1,18.41ab/
GP12sivap7_u:1663: tvattaḥ śreṣṭhā viśiṣṭāśca pūjyā bālāḥ sutā mama // ŚivP_7.1,18.42cd/
GP12sivap7_u:1664: tāsāṃ tu ye ca bhartāraste me bahumatā mudā // ŚivP_7.1,18.43ab/
GP12sivap7_u:1667: tena tvāmavamanye 'haṃ pratikūlo hi me bhavaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,18.44cd/
GP12sivap7_u:1668: tathoktā pitaraṃ dakṣaṃ kruddhā devī tamabravīt // ŚivP_7.1,18.45ab/
GP12sivap7_u:1669: śṛṇvatāmeva sarveṣāṃ ye yajñasadasi sthitāḥ // ŚivP_7.1,18.45cd/
GP12sivap7_u:1673: ta ete bahupāpmānassarve daṃḍyā iti śrutiḥ // ŚivP_7.1,18.47cd/
GP12sivap7_u:1678: ityuktvā pitaraṃ ruṣṭā satī saṃtyaktasādhvasā // ŚivP_7.1,18.50ab/
GP12sivap7_u:1679: tadīyāṃ ca tanuṃ tyaktvā himavaṃtaṃ yayau girim // ŚivP_7.1,18.50cd/
GP12sivap7_u:1681: tadarthameva kṛtavān suciraṃ duścaraṃ tapaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,18.51cd/
GP12sivap7_u:1683: svecchayā pitaraṃ cakre svātmano yogamāyayā // ŚivP_7.1,18.52cd/
GP12sivap7_u:1684: yadā gatā satī dakṣaṃ viniṃdya bhayavihvalā // ŚivP_7.1,18.53ab/
GP12sivap7_u:1685: tadā tirohitā maṃtrā vihataśca tato 'dhvaraḥ // ŚivP_7.1,18.53cd/
GP12sivap7_u:1687: dakṣāya ca ṛṣibhyaśca cukopa ca śaśāpa tān // ŚivP_7.1,18.54cd/
GP12sivap7_u:1689: pūjitāścetarāḥ sarvāḥ svasutā bhartṛbhiḥ saha // ŚivP_7.1,18.55cd/
GP12sivap7_u:1692: bhavitā mānuṣo rājā cākṣuṣasya tvamanvaye // ŚivP_7.1,18.57ab/
GP12sivap7_u:1694: ahaṃ tatrāpi te vighnamācariṣyāmi durmate // ŚivP_7.1,18.58ab/
GP12sivap7_u:1697: svāyaṃbhuvīṃ tanuṃ tyaktvā papāta bhuvi duḥkhitaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,18.59cd/
GP12sivap7_u:1698: tataḥ prācetaso dakṣo jajñe vai cākṣuṣe 'ntare // ŚivP_7.1,18.60ab/
GP12sivap7_u:1700: bhṛgvādayo 'pi jātā vai manorvaivasvatasya tu // ŚivP_7.1,18.61ab/
GP12sivap7_u:1701: aṃtare brahmaṇo yajñe vāruṇīṃ bibhratastanum // ŚivP_7.1,18.61cd/
GP12sivap7_u:1702: tadā dakṣasya dharmārthaṃ yajñe tasya durātmanaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,18.62ab/
GP12sivap7_u:1703: maheśaḥ kṛtavānvighnaṃ manā vavasvate sati // ŚivP_7.1,18.62cd/
GP12sivap7_u:1704: iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe saptamyāṃ vāyavīyasaṃhitāyāṃ pūrvakhaṇḍe satīdehatyāgo nāmāṣṭādaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12sivap7_u:1706: ṛṣaya ūcuḥ kathaṃ dakṣasya dharmārthaṃ pravṛttasya durātmanaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,19.1ab/
GP12sivap7_u:1708: vāyuruvāca viśvasya jagato māturapi devyāstapobalāt // ŚivP_7.1,19.2ab/
GP12sivap7_u:1711: saṃkīḍati tayā sārdhaṃ kāle bahutare gate // ŚivP_7.1,19.3cd/
GP12sivap7_u:1712: vaivasvate 'ṃtare prāpte dakṣaḥ prācetasaḥ svayam // ŚivP_7.1,19.4ab/
GP12sivap7_u:1714: tato himavataḥ pṛṣṭhe dakṣo vai yajñamāharat // ŚivP_7.1,19.5ab/
GP12sivap7_u:1716: tasya tasminmakhedevāḥ sarve śakra purogamāḥ // ŚivP_7.1,19.6ab/
GP12sivap7_u:1720: aśvinau pitaraścaiva tathā cānye maharṣayaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,19.8ab/
GP12sivap7_u:1721: viṣṇunā sahitāḥ sarve svāgatā yajñabhāginaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,19.8cd/
GP12sivap7_u:1724: dadhīca uvāca aprapūjye caiva pūjā pūjyānāṃ cāpya pūjane // ŚivP_7.1,19.10ab/
GP12sivap7_u:1725: naraḥ pāpamavāpnoti mahadvai nātra saṃśayaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,19.10cd/
GP12sivap7_u:1727: daṃḍo devakṛtastatra sadyaḥ patati dāruṇaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,19.11cd/
GP12sivap7_u:1729: pūjyaṃ tu paśubhartāraṃ kasmānnārcayase prabhum // ŚivP_7.1,19.12cd/
GP12sivap7_u:1730: dakṣa uvāca saṃti me bahavo rudrāḥ śūlahastāḥ kapardinaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,19.13ab/

GP12sivap7_u:2767: niṣphalo hi svabhāvo 'sya paramaḥ paramātmanaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,30.8ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2768: sa eva sakalaḥ kasmātsvabhāvo hyaviparyayaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,30.8cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2771: mūrtātmā sakalaḥ kaścitsa cānyo niṣphalaḥ śivaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,30.10ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2773: mūrtyātmaiva tadā mūrtiḥ śivasyāsya bhavediti // ŚivP_7.1,30.11ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2774: tasya mūrtau mūrtimatoḥ pārataṃtryaṃ hi niścitam // ŚivP_7.1,30.11cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2775: anyathā nirapekṣeṇa mūrtiḥ svīkriyate katham // ŚivP_7.1,30.12ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2779: svīkartuṃ svecchayā dehaṃ hātuṃ ca prabhavantyuta // ŚivP_7.1,30.14ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2780: brahmādayaḥ piśācāṃtāḥ kiṃ te karmātivartinaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,30.14cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2788: sa nirgṛhṇāti devānāṃ sarvānugrāhakaḥ katham // ŚivP_7.1,30.18cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2789: ciccheda bahuśo devo brahmaṇaḥ pañcamaṃ śiraḥ // ŚivP_7.1,30.19ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2792: bibheda padbhyāmākramya hṛdayaṃ nakharaiḥ kharaiḥ // ŚivP_7.1,30.20cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2794: vīreṇa vīrabhadreṇa na hi kaścidadaṇḍitaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,30.21cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2795: puratrayaṃ ca sastrīkaṃ sadaityaṃ saha bālakaiḥ // ŚivP_7.1,30.22ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2799: gāvaśca kaściddugdhaughaṃ sravantyo mūrdhni khecarāḥ // ŚivP_7.1,30.24ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2800: saruṣā prekṣya devena tatkṣaṇe bhasmasātkṛtaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,30.24cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2802: baddhvānaṃtena yo viṣṇuṃ cikṣepa śatayojanam // ŚivP_7.1,30.25cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2803: tameva jalasaṃdhāyī śūlenaiva jaghāna saḥ // ŚivP_7.1,30.26ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2804: taccakraṃ tapasā labdhvā labdhavīryo harissadā // ŚivP_7.1,30.26cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2809: śuṃbhassaha niśuṃbhena prāpito maraṇaṃ raṇe // ŚivP_7.1,30.29ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2810: śrutaṃ ca mahadākhyānaṃ skānde skandasamāśrayam // ŚivP_7.1,30.29cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2814: rasāṃ rasātalaṃ nītāmiva kṛtvābhidhāṃ tataḥ // ŚivP_7.1,30.31cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2820: suvarṇībhūtayā nyastaṃ merau śaravaṇe kvacit // ŚivP_7.1,30.34cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2821: saṃdīpayitvā kālena tasya bhāsā diśo daśa // ŚivP_7.1,30.35ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2823: tataścireṇa kālena saṃjāte tatra tejasi // ŚivP_7.1,30.36ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2825: tacchaiśavaṃ svarūpaṃ ca tasya dṛṣṭvā manoharam // ŚivP_7.1,30.37ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2831: svasya vakṣaḥsthale svairaṃ nartayitvā kumārakam // ŚivP_7.1,30.40ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2832: anubhūya ca tatkrīḍāṃ saṃbhāvya ca parasparam // ŚivP_7.1,30.40cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2835: svayandevaśca devī ca na tṛptimupajagmatuḥ // ŚivP_7.1,30.42ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2836: tataḥ śakreṇa saṃdhāya bibhyatā tārakāsurāt // ŚivP_7.1,30.42cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2853: śānta eva sadā sarvamanugṛhṇāti cecchivaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,30.51ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2854: sarvāṇi pūrayedeva kathaṃ śaktena mocayet // ŚivP_7.1,30.51cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2858: yathā hyāśu nivarteta tathā kathaya māruta // ŚivP_7.1,30.53cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2859: iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe saptamyāṃ vāyavīyasaṃhitāyāṃ pūrvakhaṇḍe śivatattvapraśno nāma triṃśo
GP12sivap7_u:2861: vāyuruvāca sthane saṃśayitaṃ viprā bhavadbhirhetucoditaiḥ // ŚivP_7.1,31.1ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2862: jijñāsā hi na nāstikyaṃ sādhayetsādhubuddhiṣu // ŚivP_7.1,31.1cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2864: asatāṃ tvanyathābhāvaḥ prasādena vinā prabhoḥ // ŚivP_7.1,31.2cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2866: na kiṃcidapi kartavyamiti sādhu viniścitam // ŚivP_7.1,31.3cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2881: na hyasau niṣkalaḥ sākṣācchivaḥ paramakāraṇam // ŚivP_7.1,31.11ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2888: evaṃ śivo 'pi mūrtyātmanyanārūḍha iti sthitiḥ // ŚivP_7.1,31.14cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2891: ata eva hi pūjādau mūrtyātmaparikalpanam // ŚivP_7.1,31.16ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2892: mūrtyātmani kṛtaṃ sākṣācchiva eva kṛtaṃ yataḥ // ŚivP_7.1,31.16cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2896: tathā mūrtyātmaniṣṭhena śivena paśavo vayam // ŚivP_7.1,31.18cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2899: ātmanāmeva bhogāya mokṣāya ca viśeṣataḥ // ŚivP_7.1,31.20ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2902: na ca karma śivo 'stīti tasya bhogaḥ kimātmakaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,31.21cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2903: sarvaṃ śivo 'nugṛhṇāti na nigṛhṇāti kiṃcana // ŚivP_7.1,31.22ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2904: nigṛhṇatāṃ tu ye doṣāśśive teṣāmasaṃbhavāt // ŚivP_7.1,31.22cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2907: brahmāṇḍasyādhipatyaṃ hi śrīkaṇṭhasya na saṃśayaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,31.24ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2909: sadoṣā eva devādyā nigṛhītā yathoditam // ŚivP_7.1,31.25ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2911: nigraho 'pi svarūpeṇa viduṣāṃ na jugupsitaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,31.26ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2912: ata eva hi daṇḍyeṣu daṇḍo rājñāṃ praśasyate // ŚivP_7.1,31.26cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2914: na sa cedīśatāṃ kuryājjagataḥ kathamīśvaraḥ // ŚivP_7.1,31.27cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2915: īśecchā ca vidhātṛtvaṃ vidherājñāpanaṃ param // ŚivP_7.1,31.28ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2918: viparītasamādhoḥ syānna sarvaṃ tattu dṛśyate // ŚivP_7.1,31.29cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2920: nivartate ca sāmāderaṃte daṇḍo hi sādhanam // ŚivP_7.1,31.30cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2924: sa kathaṃ duṣyate sadbhirasatāmeva nigrahāt // ŚivP_7.1,31.32cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2927: sarvo 'pi nigraho loke na ca vidveṣapūrvakaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,31.34ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2928: na hi dveṣṭi pitā putraṃ yo nigṛhyāti śikṣayet // ŚivP_7.1,31.34cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2931: anyathā na hinastyeva sadoṣānapyasau parān // ŚivP_7.1,31.36ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2933: tasmādduḥkhātmikāṃ hiṃsāṃ kurvāṇo yaḥ sanirghṛṇaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,31.37ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2934: iti nirbaṃdhayaṃtyeke niyamo neti cāpare // ŚivP_7.1,31.37cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2935: nidānajñasya bhiṣajo rugṇo hiṃsāṃ prayuṃjataḥ // ŚivP_7.1,31.38ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2936: na kiṃcidapi nairghṛṇyaṃ ghṛṇaivātra prayojikā // ŚivP_7.1,31.38cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2937: ghṛṇāpi na guṇāyaiva hiṃsreṣu pratiyogiṣu // ŚivP_7.1,31.39ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2943: tasmād ghṛṇā guṇāyaiva sarvatheti na saṃmatam // ŚivP_7.1,31.42ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2945: mūrtyātmasvapi rāgādyā doṣāḥ santyeva vastutaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,31.43ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2946: tathāpi teṣāmevaite na śivasya tu sarvathā // ŚivP_7.1,31.43cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2947: agnāvapi samāviṣṭaṃ tāmraṃ khalu sakālikam // ŚivP_7.1,31.43ef/
GP12sivap7_u:2951: evaṃ śodhyātmasaṃsargānna hyaśuddhaḥ śivo bhavet // ŚivP_7.1,31.45cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2955: na hi kāṣṭhaṃ jvalatyūrdhvamagnireva jvalatyasau // ŚivP_7.1,31.47cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2960: tairguṇairuparaktānāṃ doṣāya ca guṇāya ca // ŚivP_7.1,31.50ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2962: na guṇāya na doṣāya śivasya guṇavṛttayaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,31.50ef/
GP12sivap7_u:2964: saṃsāramocanaṃ kiṃ tu śaivamājñāmayaṃ hitam // ŚivP_7.1,31.51cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2969: hite sadā niyuktaṃ tu sarvaṃ cidacidātmakam // ŚivP_7.1,31.54ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2970: svabhāvapratibandhaṃ tatsamaṃ na labhate hitam // ŚivP_7.1,31.54cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2971: yathā vikāsayatyeva raviḥ padmāni bhānubhiḥ // ŚivP_7.1,31.55ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2973: svabhāvo 'pi hi bhāvānāṃ bhāvino 'rthasya kāraṇam // ŚivP_7.1,31.56ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2974: na hi svabhāvo naśyantamarthaṃ kartṛṣu sādhayet // ŚivP_7.1,31.56cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2977: yadyathā bhavituṃ yogyaṃ tattathā na bhavetsvayam // ŚivP_7.1,31.58ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2978: vinā bhāvanayā kartā svatantrassantato bhavet // ŚivP_7.1,31.58cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2981: anyathā saṃsarantyete niyamānna śivaḥ katham // ŚivP_7.1,31.60ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2984: sa heturātmanāmeva nijo nāgantuko malaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,31.61cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2985: āgantukatve kasyāpi bhāvyaṃ kenāpi hetunā // ŚivP_7.1,31.62ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2987: ātmatāyāḥ samatve 'pi baddhā muktāḥ pare yataḥ // ŚivP_7.1,31.63ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2991: mūrtyātmasu śivāḥ kecidadhvanāṃ mūrdhasu sthitāḥ // ŚivP_7.1,31.65ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2998: śāntyatītapade śaivāḥ śānte māheśvare tataḥ // ŚivP_7.1,31.68cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2999: vidyāyāntu yathā raudrāḥ pratiṣṭhāyāṃ tu vaiṣṇavāḥ // ŚivP_7.1,31.69ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3000: nivṛttau ca tathātmāno brahmā brahmāṃgayonayaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,31.69cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3004: yathāmabhāvo muktasya pūrvaṃ paścāttu pakvatā // ŚivP_7.1,31.71cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3006: āme tvadharatā puṃsāṃ pakve tūttaratā kramāt // ŚivP_7.1,31.72cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3008: atrottarā ekamalā dvimalā madhyamā matāḥ // ŚivP_7.1,31.73cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3021: pṛthivīpada ityevaṃ devā devavrataiḥ stutā // ŚivP_7.1,31.79cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3024: asya rogasya bhaiṣajyaṃ jñānameva na cāparam // ŚivP_7.1,31.81ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3027: kathaṃ duḥkhaṃ karotīti nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // ŚivP_7.1,31.82cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3028: duḥkhameva hi sarvo 'pi saṃsāra iti niścitam // ŚivP_7.1,31.83ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3030: na hi rogī hyarogī syādbhiṣagbhaiṣajyakāraṇāt // ŚivP_7.1,31.84ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3034: na bhiṣakkāraṇaṃ roge śivaḥ saṃsārakāraṇam // ŚivP_7.1,31.86ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3035: ityetadapi vaiṣamyaṃ na doṣāyāsya kalpate // ŚivP_7.1,31.86cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3037: svābhāviko malaḥ puṃsāṃ sa hi saṃsārayatyamūn // ŚivP_7.1,31.87cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3042: na nivartayituṃ śakyaṃ sānnidhyaṃ sadakāraṇam // ŚivP_7.1,31.90ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3044: na śivena vinā kiṃcitpravṛttamiha vidyate // ŚivP_7.1,31.91ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3045: tatpreritamidaṃ sarvaṃ tathāpi na sa muhyati // ŚivP_7.1,31.91cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3047: tayā tatamidaṃ śaśvattathāpi sa na duṣyati // ŚivP_7.1,31.92cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3048: anidaṃ prathamaṃ sarvamīśitavyaṃ sa īśvaraḥ // ŚivP_7.1,31.93ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3049: īśanācca tadīyājñā tathāpi sa na duṣyati // ŚivP_7.1,31.93cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3050: yo 'nyathā manyate mohātsa vinaṣyati durmatiḥ // ŚivP_7.1,31.94ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3051: tacchaktivaibhavādeva tathāpi sa na duṣyati // ŚivP_7.1,31.94cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3055: munayo vismayāviṣṭāḥ preṇemuḥ pavanaṃ prabhum // ŚivP_7.1,31.96cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3058: vāyuruvācva parokṣamaparokṣaṃ ca dvividhaṃ jñānamiṣyate // ŚivP_7.1,31.98ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3062: nāparokṣādṛte mokṣa iti kṛtvā viniścayam // ŚivP_7.1,31.100ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3064: iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe saptamyāṃ vāyavīyasaṃhitāyāṃ pūrvakhaṇḍe jñānopadeśo nāmaikatriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12sivap7_u:3066: ṛṣaya ūcuḥ kiṃ tacchreṣṭamanuṣṭhānaṃ mokṣo yenaparokṣitaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,32.1ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3067: tattasya sādhanaṃ cādya vaktumarhasi māruta // ŚivP_7.1,32.1cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3068: vāyuruvāca śaivo hi paramo dharmaḥ śreṣṭhānuṣṭhānaśabditaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,32.2ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3070: sa tu pañcavidho jñeyaḥ pañcabhiḥ parvabhiḥ kramāt // ŚivP_7.1,32.3ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3072: taireva sottaraissiddho dharmastu paramo mataḥ // ŚivP_7.1,32.4ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3073: parokṣamaparokṣaṃ ca jñānaṃ yatra ca mokṣadam // ŚivP_7.1,32.4cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3080: sa cāyaṃ paramo dharmaḥ paradharmasya sādhanam // ŚivP_7.1,32.8ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3082: śaivo yaḥ paramo dharmaḥ śreṣṭhānuṣṭhānaśabditaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,32.9ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3086: śaivāgamo hi dvividhaḥ śrauto 'śrautaśca saṃskṛtaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,32.11ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3088: svataṃtro daśadhā pūrvaṃ tathāṣṭādaśadhā punaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,32.12ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3091: paraṃ pāśupataṃ yatra vrataṃ jñānaṃ ca kathyate // ŚivP_7.1,32.13cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3096: te ca pāśupatā jñeyāssaṃhitānāṃ pravartakāḥ // ŚivP_7.1,32.16ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3099: teṣu pāśupato yogaḥ śivaṃ pratyakṣayeddṛḍham // ŚivP_7.1,32.17cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3101: tatrāpyupāyako yukto brahmaṇā sa tu kathyate // ŚivP_7.1,32.18cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3103: tena yogena sahasā śaivī prajñā prajāyate // ŚivP_7.1,32.19cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3105: prasīdati śivastasya yasya jñānaṃ pratiṣṭhitam // ŚivP_7.1,32.20cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3106: prasādātparamo yogo yaḥ śivaṃ cāparokṣayet // ŚivP_7.1,32.21ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3108: tataḥ syānmuktasaṃsāro muktaḥ śivasamo bhavet // ŚivP_7.1,32.22ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3109: brahmaprokta ityupāyaḥ sa eva pṛthagucyate // ŚivP_7.1,32.22cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3110: śivo maheśvaraścaiva rudro viṣṇuḥ pitāmahaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,32.23ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3116: padameva hi tannityamanityāḥ padinaḥ smṛtāḥ // ŚivP_7.1,32.26ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3117: padānāṃ pratikṛttau tu mucyante padino yataḥ // ŚivP_7.1,32.26cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3127: prakṛtestu paraṃ prāhuḥ puruṣaṃ pañcaviṃśakam // ŚivP_7.1,32.31cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3130: tasya prakṛtilīnasya yaḥ parassa maheśvaraḥ // ŚivP_7.1,32.33ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3133: māyāntu prakṛtiṃ vidyānmāyinaṃ tu maheśvaram // ŚivP_7.1,32.34cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3135: kālātmā paramātmādiḥ sthūlaḥ sūkṣmaḥ prakīrtitaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,32.35cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3136: rudduḥkhaṃ duḥkhaheturvā tadrāvayati naḥ prabhuḥ // ŚivP_7.1,32.36ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3137: rudra ityucyate sadbhiḥ śivaḥ paramakāraṇam // ŚivP_7.1,32.36cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3142: nidānajño yathā vaidyo rogasya vinivartakaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,32.39ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3148: aṇavo naiva jānanti māyayaiva malāvṛtāḥ // ŚivP_7.1,32.42ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3159: chittvā paryaṣṭakākāraṃ svātmānaṃ ca suṣumṇayā // ŚivP_7.1,32.47cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3168: dhyātvā hi mānase devaṃ svasthacitto 'tha mānavaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,32.52ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3170: abhyarcanānte tu punaḥ prāṇānāyamya mānavaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,32.53ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3171: samyakcittaṃ samādhāya śārvaṃ nāmāṣṭakaṃ japet // ŚivP_7.1,32.53cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3175: evaṃ kṛtvā cirādeva jñānaṃ pāśupataṃ śubham // ŚivP_7.1,32.55cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3176: labhate tatpratiṣṭhāṃ ca vṛttaṃ cānuttamaṃ tathā // ŚivP_7.1,32.56ab/

GP12sivap7_u:4545: prathamaṃ karmayajñena bahiḥ sampūjya māṃ priye // ŚivP_7.2,10.43ab/
GP12sivap7_u:4547: vidite mama yāthātmye karmayajñena dehinaḥ // ŚivP_7.2,10.44ab/
GP12sivap7_u:4548: na yajaṃti hi māṃ yuktāḥ samaloṣṭāśmakāṃcanāḥ // ŚivP_7.2,10.44cd/
GP12sivap7_u:4549: nityayukto muniḥ śreṣṭho madbhaktaśca samāhitaḥ // ŚivP_7.2,10.45ab/
GP12sivap7_u:4553: dvidhā matpūjanaṃ jñeyaṃ bāhyamābhyaṃtaraṃ tathā // ŚivP_7.2,10.47ab/
GP12sivap7_u:4555: tapaḥ karma japo dhyānaṃ jñānaṃ vetyanupūrvaśaḥ // ŚivP_7.2,10.48ab/
GP12sivap7_u:4556: pañcadhā kathyate sadbhistadeva bhajanaṃ punaḥ // ŚivP_7.2,10.48cd/
GP12sivap7_u:4560: mannāmaniratā vāṇī vāṅmatā khalu netarā // ŚivP_7.2,10.50cd/
GP12sivap7_u:4562: mamopacāranirataḥ kāyaḥ kāyo na cetaraḥ // ŚivP_7.2,10.51cd/
GP12sivap7_u:4564: madarthe dehasaṃśoṣastapaḥ kṛcchrādi no matam // ŚivP_7.2,10.52cd/
GP12sivap7_u:4565: japaḥ pañcākṣarābhyāsaḥ praṇavābhyāsa eva ca // ŚivP_7.2,10.53ab/
GP12sivap7_u:4569: bāhye vābhyaṃtare vātha yatra syānmanaso ratiḥ // ŚivP_7.2,10.55ab/
GP12sivap7_u:4577: kṛtakṛtyasya pūtasya mama kiṃ kriyate naraiḥ // ŚivP_7.2,10.59ab/
GP12sivap7_u:4578: bahirvābhyaṃtaraṃ vātha mayā bhāvo hi gṛhyate // ŚivP_7.2,10.59cd/
GP12sivap7_u:4579: bhāvaikātmā kriyā devi mama dharmassanātanaḥ // ŚivP_7.2,10.60ab/
GP12sivap7_u:4580: manasā karmaṇā vācā hyanapekṣya phalaṃ kvacit // ŚivP_7.2,10.60cd/
GP12sivap7_u:4582: phalārthī tadabhāve māṃ parityaktuṃ kṣamo yataḥ // ŚivP_7.2,10.61cd/
GP12sivap7_u:4583: phalārthino 'pi yasyaiva mayi cittaṃ pratiṣṭhitam // ŚivP_7.2,10.62ab/
GP12sivap7_u:4585: phalānapekṣayā yeṣāṃ mano matpravaṇaṃ bhavet // ŚivP_7.2,10.63ab/
GP12sivap7_u:4586: prārthayeyuḥ phalaṃ paścādbhaktāste 'pi mama priyāḥ // ŚivP_7.2,10.63cd/
GP12sivap7_u:4587: prāk saṃskāravaśādeva ye viciṃtya phalāphale // ŚivP_7.2,10.64ab/
GP12sivap7_u:4588: vivaśā māṃ prapadyaṃte mama priyatamā matāḥ // ŚivP_7.2,10.64cd/
GP12sivap7_u:4599: evamaṣṭavidhaṃ cihnaṃ yasmin mlecche 'pi vartate // ŚivP_7.2,10.70ab/
GP12sivap7_u:4600: sa viprendro muniḥ śrīmānsa yatissa ca paṃḍitaḥ // ŚivP_7.2,10.70cd/
GP12sivap7_u:4601: na me priyaścaturvedī madbhakto śvapaco 'pi yaḥ // ŚivP_7.2,10.71ab/
GP12sivap7_u:4602: tasmai deyaṃ tato grāhyaṃ sa ca pūjyo yathā hyaham // ŚivP_7.2,10.71cd/
GP12sivap7_u:4603: patraṃ puṣpaṃ phalaṃ toyaṃ yo me bhaktyā prayacchati // ŚivP_7.2,10.72ab/
GP12sivap7_u:4604: tasyāhaṃ na praṇaśyāmi sa ca me na praṇaśyati // ŚivP_7.2,10.72cd/
GP12sivap7_u:4605: oṃ iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe saptamyāṃ vāyavīyasaṃhitāyāmuttarakhaṇḍe śivabhaktivarṇanaṃ nāma daśamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12sivap7_u:4607: īśvara uvāca atha vakṣyāmi deveśi bhaktānāmadhikāriṇām // ŚivP_7.2,11.1ab/
GP12sivap7_u:4609: triḥ snānaṃ cāgnikāryaṃ ca liṃgārcanamanukramam // ŚivP_7.2,11.2ab/
GP12sivap7_u:4613: vyākhyānaṃ brahmacaryaṃ ca śravaṇaṃ ca tapaḥ kṣamā // ŚivP_7.2,11.4ab/
GP12sivap7_u:4614: śaucaṃ śikhopavītaṃ ca uṣṇīṣaṃ cottarīyakam // ŚivP_7.2,11.4cd/
GP12sivap7_u:4617: pānaṃ ca brahmakūrcasya māsi māsi yathāvidhi // ŚivP_7.2,11.6ab/
GP12sivap7_u:4618: abhyarcanaṃ viśeṣeṇa tenaiva snāpya māṃ priye // ŚivP_7.2,11.6cd/
GP12sivap7_u:4619: sarvakriyānna santyāgaḥ śraddhānnasya ca varjanam // ŚivP_7.2,11.7ab/
GP12sivap7_u:4621: madyasya madyagandhasya naivedyasya ca varjanam // ŚivP_7.2,11.8ab/
GP12sivap7_u:4624: brahmacaryaṃ mama jñānaṃ vairāgyaṃ bhasmasevanam // ŚivP_7.2,11.9cd/
GP12sivap7_u:4626: liṃgāni yogināṃ bhūyo divā bhikṣāśanaṃ tathā // ŚivP_7.2,11.10cd/
GP12sivap7_u:4628: rātrau na bhojanaṃ kāryaṃ sarveṣāṃ brahmacāriṇām // ŚivP_7.2,11.11cd/
GP12sivap7_u:4630: vaiśyasya ca viśeṣeṇa mayā nātra vidhīyate // ŚivP_7.2,11.12cd/
GP12sivap7_u:4632: duṣṭapakṣimṛgāṇāṃ ca duṣṭānāṃ śātanaṃ nṛṇām // ŚivP_7.2,11.13cd/
GP12sivap7_u:4633: aviśvāsaśca sarvatra viśvāso mama yogiṣu // ŚivP_7.2,11.14ab/
GP12sivap7_u:4638: gorakṣaṇaṃ ca vāṇijyaṃ kṛṣirvaiśyasya kathyate // ŚivP_7.2,11.16cd/
GP12sivap7_u:4643: strīṇāṃ tu bhartṛśuśrūṣā dharmo nānyassanātanaḥ // ŚivP_7.2,11.19ab/
GP12sivap7_u:4644: mamārcanaṃ ca kalyāṇi niyogo bharturasti cet // ŚivP_7.2,11.19cd/
GP12sivap7_u:4645: yā nārī bhartṛśuśrūṣāṃ vihāya vratatatparā // ŚivP_7.2,11.20ab/
GP12sivap7_u:4646: sā nārī narakaṃ yāti nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // ŚivP_7.2,11.20cd/
GP12sivap7_u:4647: atha bhartṛvihīnāyā vakṣye dharmaṃ sanātanam // ŚivP_7.2,11.21ab/
GP12sivap7_u:4648: vrataṃ dānaṃ tapaḥ śaucaṃ bhūśayyānaktabhojanam // ŚivP_7.2,11.21cd/
GP12sivap7_u:4649: brahmacaryaṃ sadā snānaṃ bhasmanā salilena vā // ŚivP_7.2,11.22ab/
GP12sivap7_u:4650: śāṃtirmaunaṃ kṣamā nityaṃ saṃvibhāgo yathāvidhi // ŚivP_7.2,11.22cd/
GP12sivap7_u:4651: aṣṭābhyāṃ ca caturdaśyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ viśeṣataḥ // ŚivP_7.2,11.23ab/
GP12sivap7_u:4655: tathaiva vānaprasthānāṃ gṛhasthānāṃ ca sundari // ŚivP_7.2,11.25ab/
GP12sivap7_u:4656: śūdrāṇāmatha nārīṇāṃ dharma eṣa sanātanaḥ // ŚivP_7.2,11.25cd/
GP12sivap7_u:4657: dhyeyastvayāhaṃ deveśi sadā jāpyaḥ ṣaḍakṣaraḥ // ŚivP_7.2,11.26ab/
GP12sivap7_u:4659: atha ye mānavā loke svecchayā dhṛtavigrahāḥ // ŚivP_7.2,11.27ab/
GP12sivap7_u:4661: viraktā vānuraktā vā stryādīnāṃ viṣayeṣvapi // ŚivP_7.2,11.28ab/
GP12sivap7_u:4665: nāsti kṛtyamakṛtyaṃ ca samādhirvā parāyaṇam // ŚivP_7.2,11.30ab/
GP12sivap7_u:4666: na vidhirna niṣedhaśca teṣāṃ mama yathā tathā // ŚivP_7.2,11.30cd/
GP12sivap7_u:4668: tatheha paripūrṇasya sādhyaṃ mama na vidyate // ŚivP_7.2,11.31ab/
GP12sivap7_u:4669: tathaiva kṛtakṛtyānāṃ teṣāmapi na saṃśayaḥ // ŚivP_7.2,11.31cd/
GP12sivap7_u:4683: sa tathaiva mama sānnidhyānna te kevalamānuṣāḥ // ŚivP_7.2,11.38cd/
GP12sivap7_u:4687: āyuḥ śriyaṃ kulaṃ śīlaṃ hitvā nirayamāvahet // ŚivP_7.2,11.40cd/
GP12sivap7_u:4690: aśuddhaṃ bauddhamaiśvaryaṃ prākṛtaṃ pauruṣaṃ tathā // ŚivP_7.2,11.42ab/
GP12sivap7_u:4692: atha kiṃ bahunoktena śreyaḥ prāptyaikasādhanam // ŚivP_7.2,11.43ab/
GP12sivap7_u:4693: mayi cittasamāsaṃgo yena kenāpi hetunā // ŚivP_7.2,11.43cd/
GP12sivap7_u:4694: upamanyuruvāca itthaṃ śrīkaṇṭhanāthena śivena paramātmanā // ŚivP_7.2,11.44ab/
GP12sivap7_u:4699: sādhyaṃ ceti ṣaḍarthānāṃ saṃgrahatveṣa saṃgrahaḥ // ŚivP_7.2,11.46cd/
GP12sivap7_u:4700: guroradhikṛtaṃ jñānaṃ jñeyaṃ pāśaḥ paśuḥ patiḥ // ŚivP_7.2,11.47ab/
GP12sivap7_u:4706: ratirabhyaṃtare yasya na bāhye puṇyagauravāt // ŚivP_7.2,11.50ab/
GP12sivap7_u:4707: na karma karaṇīyaṃ hi bahistasya mahātmanāḥ // ŚivP_7.2,11.50cd/
GP12sivap7_u:4709: nāṃtarna ca bahiḥ kṛṣṇa kṛtyamasti kadācana // ŚivP_7.2,11.51cd/
GP12sivap7_u:4712: naikāgraṃ cecchive cittaṃ kiṃ kṛtenāpi karmaṇā // ŚivP_7.2,11.53ab/
GP12sivap7_u:4713: ekāgrameva ceccittaṃ kiṃ kṛtenāpi karmaṇā // ŚivP_7.2,11.53cd/
GP12sivap7_u:4715: yena kenāpyupāyena śive cittaṃ niveśayet // ŚivP_7.2,11.54cd/
GP12sivap7_u:4717: paratreha ca sarvatra nirvṛtiḥ paramā bhavet // ŚivP_7.2,11.55cd/
GP12sivap7_u:4720: oṃ iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe saptamyāṃ vāyavīyasaṃhitāyāmuttarakhaṃḍe śivajñānavarṇanaṃ nāmaikādaśo
GP12sivap7_u:4722: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca maharṣivara sarvajña sarvajñānamahodadhe // ŚivP_7.2,12.1ab/
GP12sivap7_u:4735: atisūkṣmaṃ mahārthaṃ ca jñeyaṃ tadvaṭabījavat // ŚivP_7.2,12.7cd/
GP12sivap7_u:4737: omityekākṣare mantre sthitaḥ sarvagataḥ śivaḥ // ŚivP_7.2,12.8cd/
GP12sivap7_u:4740: maṃtre ṣaḍakṣare sūkṣme pañcabrahmatanuḥ śivaḥ // ŚivP_7.2,12.9ef/
GP12sivap7_u:4751: na tatkartṛ svayaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ buddhimatkāraṇaṃ vinā // ŚivP_7.2,12.15ab/
GP12sivap7_u:4753: na sarvajñaṃ vinā puṃsāmādisargaḥ prasiddhyati // ŚivP_7.2,12.16ab/
GP12sivap7_u:4754: vaidyaṃ vinā nirānaṃdāḥ kliśyaṃte rogiṇo yathā // ŚivP_7.2,12.16cd/
GP12sivap7_u:4756: asti nāthaḥ paritrātā puṃsāṃ saṃsārasāgarāt // ŚivP_7.2,12.17cd/
GP12sivap7_u:4765: lokānugrahakartā ca sa mṛṣārthaṃ kathaṃ vadet // ŚivP_7.2,12.22ab/
GP12sivap7_u:4767: yāvatphalaṃ ca tatpūrṇaṃ sarvajñastu yathā vadet // ŚivP_7.2,12.23ab/
GP12sivap7_u:4769: te ceśvare na vidyete brūyātsa kathamanyathā // ŚivP_7.2,12.24ab/
GP12sivap7_u:4771: praṇītamamalaṃ vākyaṃ tatpramāṇaṃ na saṃśayaḥ // ŚivP_7.2,12.24ef/
GP12sivap7_u:4778: saṃskṛtenāpi kiṃ tena mṛdunā lalitena vā // ŚivP_7.2,12.28ab/
GP12sivap7_u:4780: yacchrutvā jāyate śreyo rāgādīnāṃ ca saṃśayaḥ // ŚivP_7.2,12.29ab/
GP12sivap7_u:4782: bahutvepi hi maṃtrāṇāṃ sarvajñena śivena yaḥ // ŚivP_7.2,12.30ab/
GP12sivap7_u:4783: praṇīto vimalo mantro na tena sadṛśaḥ kvacit // ŚivP_7.2,12.30cd/
GP12sivap7_u:4787: mantraḥ ṣaḍakṣaro bhinnassūtraṃ vṛtyātmanā yathā // ŚivP_7.2,12.32cd/
GP12sivap7_u:4788: śivajñānāni yāvaṃti vidyāsthānāpi yāni ca // ŚivP_7.2,12.33ab/
GP12sivap7_u:4789: ṣaḍakṣarasya sūtrasya tāni bhāṣyaṃ samāsataḥ // ŚivP_7.2,12.33cd/
GP12sivap7_u:4791: yasyonnamaḥ śivāyeti mantro 'yaṃ hṛdi saṃsthitaḥ // ŚivP_7.2,12.34cd/
GP12sivap7_u:4792: tenādhītaṃ śrutaṃ tena kṛtaṃ sarvamanuṣṭhitam // ŚivP_7.2,12.35ab/
GP12sivap7_u:4795: jihvāgre vartate yasya saphalaṃ tasya jīvitam // ŚivP_7.2,12.36cd/
GP12sivap7_u:4796: aṃtyajo vādhamo vāpi mūrkho vā paṃḍito 'pi vā // ŚivP_7.2,12.37ab/
GP12sivap7_u:4798: ityuktaṃ parameśena devyā pṛṣṭena śūlinā // ŚivP_7.2,12.38ab/
GP12sivap7_u:4799: hitāya sarvamartyānāṃ dvijānāṃ tu viśeṣataḥ // ŚivP_7.2,12.38cd/
GP12sivap7_u:4800: oṃ iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe saptamyāṃ vāyavīyasaṃhitāyāmuttarakhaṇḍe pañcākṣaramāhātmyavarṇanaṃ nāma dvādaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12sivap7_u:4802: devyuvāca kalau kaluṣite kāle durjaye duratikrame // ŚivP_7.2,13.1ab/
GP12sivap7_u:4805: sarvādhikāre saṃdigdhe niścite vāpi paryaye // ŚivP_7.2,13.2cd/
GP12sivap7_u:4808: īśvara uvāca āśritya paramāṃ vidyāṃ hṛdyāṃ pañcākṣarīṃ mama // ŚivP_7.2,13.4ab/
GP12sivap7_u:4809: bhaktyā ca bhāvitātmāno mucyaṃte kalijā narāḥ // ŚivP_7.2,13.4cd/
GP12sivap7_u:4816: devyuvāca karmāyogyo bhavenmartyaḥ patito yadi sarvathā // ŚivP_7.2,13.8ab/
GP12sivap7_u:4817: karmāyogena yatkarma kṛtaṃ ca narakāya hi // ŚivP_7.2,13.8cd/
GP12sivap7_u:4818: tataḥ kathaṃ vimucyeta patito vidyayā 'nayā // ŚivP_7.2,13.8ef/
GP12sivap7_u:4819: īśvara uvāca tathyametattvayā proktaṃ tathā hi śṛṇu sundari // ŚivP_7.2,13.9ab/
GP12sivap7_u:4821: samaṃtrakaṃ māṃ patitaḥ pūjayedyadi mohitaḥ // ŚivP_7.2,13.10ab/
GP12sivap7_u:4822: nārakī syānna sandeho mama pañcākṣaraṃ vinā // ŚivP_7.2,13.10cd/
GP12sivap7_u:4823: abbhakṣā vāyubhakṣāśca ye cānye vratakarśitāḥ // ŚivP_7.2,13.11ab/
GP12sivap7_u:4825: bhaktyā pañcākṣareṇaiva yo hi māṃ sakṛdarcayet // ŚivP_7.2,13.12ab/
GP12sivap7_u:4826: so 'pi gacchenmama sthānaṃ mantrasyāsyaiva gauravāt // ŚivP_7.2,13.12cd/
GP12sivap7_u:4829: baddho vāpyatha mukto vā pāśātpañcākṣareṇa yaḥ // ŚivP_7.2,13.14ab/
GP12sivap7_u:4830: pūjayenmāṃ sa mucyeta nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // ŚivP_7.2,13.14cd/
GP12sivap7_u:4831: arudro vā sarudro vā sakṛtpañcākṣareṇa yaḥ // ŚivP_7.2,13.15ab/
GP12sivap7_u:4832: pūjayetpatito vāpi mūḍho vā mucyate naraḥ // ŚivP_7.2,13.15cd/
GP12sivap7_u:4833: ṣaḍakṣareṇa vā devi tathā pañcākṣareṇa vā // ŚivP_7.2,13.16ab/
GP12sivap7_u:4834: sa brahmāṃgena māṃ bhaktyā pūjayedyadi mucyate // ŚivP_7.2,13.16cd/
GP12sivap7_u:4836: mama bhakto jitakrodho salabdho 'labdha eva vā // ŚivP_7.2,13.17cd/
GP12sivap7_u:4838: tasmāllabdhvaiva māṃ devi mantreṇānena pūjayet // ŚivP_7.2,13.18cd/
GP12sivap7_u:4842: mama pañcākṣare maṃtre tasmācchreṣṭhataro hi saḥ // ŚivP_7.2,13.20cd/
GP12sivap7_u:4844: tiṣṭhaṃti śāśvatā dharmā devāssarvamidaṃ jagat // ŚivP_7.2,13.21cd/
GP12sivap7_u:4847: eko 'haṃ saṃsthito devi na dvitīyo 'sti kutracit // ŚivP_7.2,13.23ab/
GP12sivap7_u:4848: tadā vedāśca śāstrāṇi sarve pañcākṣare sthitāḥ // ŚivP_7.2,13.23cd/
GP12sivap7_u:4849: te nāśaṃ naiva saṃprāptā macchaktyā hyanupālitāḥ // ŚivP_7.2,13.24ab/
GP12sivap7_u:4852: tadā nārāyaṇaśśete devo māyāmayīṃ tanum // ŚivP_7.2,13.25cd/
GP12sivap7_u:4857: teṣāṃ siddhivivṛddhyarthaṃ māṃ provāca pitāmahaḥ // ŚivP_7.2,13.28ab/
GP12sivap7_u:4858: matputrāṇāṃ mahādeva śaktiṃ dehi maheśvara // ŚivP_7.2,13.28cd/
GP12sivap7_u:4863: jñātvā prayogaṃ vividhaṃ siddhamaṃtraḥ prajāpatiḥ // ŚivP_7.2,13.31ab/
GP12sivap7_u:4864: putrebhyaḥ pradadau maṃtraṃ maṃtrārthaṃ ca yathātatham //
GP12sivap7_u:4865: te ca labdhvā maṃtraratnaṃ sākṣāllokapitāmahāt // ŚivP_7.2,13.32ab/
GP12sivap7_u:4867: merostu śikhare ramye muṃjavānnāma parvataḥ // ŚivP_7.2,13.33ab/
GP12sivap7_u:4869: tasyābhyāśe tapastīvraṃ lokaṃ sraṣṭuṃ samutsukāḥ // ŚivP_7.2,13.34ab/
